Headache Relief:

1. Give the bottle a quick shake.

products.title: 12 oz French Press (Stainless Steel)
products.description:
Cheers to the morning ritual you forgot you needed this summer. 

Durable Construction: Made of tough, 18/10 food-grade stainless steel. Unlike other glass coffee makers, mira's highly rated stainless steel French press won’t break, shatter or crack. With their double walled insulated French press, liquids remain hot and ready for your next cup of coffee or tea!

Quick & Easy Enjoyment: Create delicious hot coffee daily with your convenient coffee press. Simply measure out your coffee grounds, heat water, let steep for 4-6 minutes, plunge the press, and enjoy! The stainless steel interior and exterior of the metal French press makes cleaning a snap and is dishwasher safe.

Bolder Flavors & Aromas: For the ultimate coffee experience, mira's French press includes an ultra-fine mesh filter that thoroughly filters coffee grounds and teas to reduce acids and eliminates the taste of a paper filter. An extra mesh filter screen is also included with your coffee pot. The high-quality of this French press stainless steel pot provides a fresh, non-metallic taste for the best cup of coffee or tea.

Versatile & Portable: This small French press is perfect for making single serve coffee. Make yourself a rich, smooth cup of coffee at home or while on the go. The compact size of the individual sized coffee press makes it terrific for trips, camping adventures or at work. Use your multifunctional French press to make piping hot coffee, cold brew coffee or loose leaf tea. This personal size French press is a terrific gift for coffee and tea lovers!

Innovative Design: This sleek and modern French press displays beautifully and is designed with the user in mind. For your hands comfort, the sturdy ergonomic handle stays cool even when the French press is filled with hot liquids. The French presses spout provides a smooth pour to reduce spills and drips.
products.specs:
•12 oz / 350 ml
•6.9 x 3.5 x 4.9 inches
•Hand Wash Only
•Insturctions: measure out your coffee grounds, heat water, let steep for 4-6 minutes, plunge the press, and enjoy! The stainless steel interior and exterior of the metal French press makes cleaning a snap and is dishwasher safe.
•18/10 food-grade stainless steel

products.title: ISLAND JADE Gemstone Gua Sha + Massaging Comb
products.description: Scrub the stress away and bring a little island vibes to your skincare routine with this Jade Gemstone comb. Based on traditional Chinese medicinal practices, and infused with some quintessential Earth Harbor seaside relaxation, use this piece to release muscle tension by rubbing it along the face, scalp or body. Jade’s soothing chill helps release and relax, letting your worries just float away.
products.specs:
• 100% Grade-A Jade
• As a head & scalp massager: Use light, circular motions with the jade comb to stimulate your scalp and promote relaxation. Focus on the areas near your ears and right above your neck to reduce tension. For extra benefit, add a few drops of Sunstone Hair Revive Elixir to your scalp and massage in by using Island Jade Massaging Comb.
• As a face Gua Sha: Use the smooth gua sha side of your jade tool over clean skin daily for 3 - 5 minutes. Massage from the center of your face by your nose outward towards cheeks. Then proceed to massage down your chin and up your forehead. For best results, apply Earth Harbor treatments to skin first, then massage them in using your Island Jade Gua Sha.
• As a body Gua Sha: Using the smooth gua sha side of your tool, massage anywhere on your body by “scraping” skin with firm pressure to help relieve tight muscles. For best results, apply Laguna Replenishing Body Serum to skin first, then massage in using your Island Jade Gua Sha.
• To assure ethical sourcing and quality, we maintain a direct relationship with the factory.
• Due to natural variations in stone, every jade comb is unique in pattern and color.

There were plenty of organizations donating wigs, but none giving headbands so Jess decided to start one. For every Headbands of Hope product sold, a child with cancer receives a headband.

There were plenty of organizations donating wigs, but none giving headbands so Jess decided to start one. For every Headbands of Hope product sold, a child with cancer receives a headband.

products.title: Aina - Invigorating Face Mask
products.description:
Āina... For the land lovers

'ĀINA = DETOXIFYING. STIMULATING. NOURISHING.

Inspired by powerful ingredients grown throughout the Hawaiian islands, 'Āina draws its name from the land ('Āina means "land" in the Hawaiian language).

'Āina is a detoxifying mask that utilizes potent plant-derived ingredients to give any skin type a revitalized glow. Bamboo charcoal draws out impurities from the skin while the ni’oi (Hawaiian chili pepper) aids in detoxification and stimulation of blood flow.

While this mask is deeply cleansing, it does not leave skin feeling dry like most charcoal masks as it also feeds the skin with kalo (Hawaiian taro root). This plant is filled with skin loving phytonutrients, vitamins and minerals, such as beta-carotene, anti-aging vitamins A and C, and skin repairing manganese. 'Ōlena (turmeric) brightens while tamanu oil brings balance and hydration to this active mask.
products.specs:
•1.7 fl oz/50 ml
•Directions: Use 1-2x weekly after cleansing with the Pa'akai Cleansing Cream. Massage a dime-nickel size amount over entire face and let it work its magic for 10-15 minutes. A slight tingling sensation is typical but will dissipate after a few minutes.
•Ingredient List
Water/Aqua, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Honey/Mel/Miel, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Solum Fullonum, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Colocasia Esculenta Powder, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Powder, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Powder, Charcoal Powder, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Squalane, Capsicum Frutescens Powder, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Rosemarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinalis (Ginger) Root Oil, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Alcohol, Cetearyl Phosphate, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Citric Acid

products.title: Moana Rejuvenating Face Mask
products.description:
Make way for the MOANA Mask

MOANA = HYDRATING. BRIGHTENING. PLUMPING. REVITALIZING.

The magic in the Moana Mask comes from ingredients found throughout the Hawaiian islands, including Hawaii's moana ("ocean" in the Hawaiian language).

After sun and fun, your skin needs some love. The Moana Mask is the perfect remedy. This mask draws ingredients from our precious ocean, such as limu ko’a or Hawaiian spirulina, a blue green algae that is high in antioxidants and is known to boost cell regeneration to help with premature aging. No Honua product is complete without its key Hawaiian healing ingredient... this mask is no exception. Moana contains laukahi, a potent skin healing plant used for centuries in traditional medicine. 

This mask will revive and nourish your thirsty skin.
products.specs:
•1.7 fl oz/50 ml
•Directions: Use 1-2x weekly after cleansing your face. Massage a dime-nickel size amount over entire face and let it work its magic for 10-15 minutes or even longer if you choose. Rinse or towel off with cool water.
•Ingredient list: Hawaiian Honey, French Green Clay, Kaolin Clay,Bentonite Clay, Hawaiian Spirulina, Laukahi (Hawaiian Plantain), Lau Comfrey, Licorice root, 'Olena(Hawaiian Turmeric), Aloe Vera leaf, Witch Hazel leaf, Hawaiian Sandalwood Oil and Hydrosol, Neroli Hydrosol, Bulgarian Rose Hydrosol, Tamanu, Macadamia Nut Oil, Coconut Vegetable Glycerin, Wheat Germ Oil, Willow Bark Extract, Jasmine CO2, Essential Oils of Neroli, Loke/Rose, Petitgrain, Red Mandarin, Sweet Orange, Antioxidants of Sage, Rosemary, Sodium Benzoate (hydrosol preservation)

Roll over masks, serums, oils, and creams to increase product absorption.
Store in the freezer overnight. Use cold in the AM to depuff the skin. You can thank us later!
products.specs:
Cleaning Instructions:
Salt is a powerful anti-bacterial substance and absorbs negative and unwanted energies.
1. Fill a plate with coarse Himalayan salt and gently place the crystal roller directly on top of the salt. It should be left on top for several hours or overnight.
2. The crystal roller should be wiped down with a dry or moist towelette -- only on the crystal parts -- to remove any remaining salt.
3. If you want to deep clean the crystal roller, remove the heads and deep clean it that way as well. Try not to soak the roller in water and gently wash -- only on the crystal parts.

**Avoid cleaning with chemicals and harsh irritants.

products.title: French Pillowcase Linen Set (Blush)
products.description: How do you say “I slept like a baby” in French? The Sijo French Linen Pillow Case is everything you dreamed a pillow case could be and then some. First, they source their flax (a material that requires minimal water) from Normandy in small batches to ensure it’s the highest quality. Once the raw material has been transformed into linen, it is stonewashed to give it that soft, worn in comfort. You’ll rest easy knowing these are sustainably, ethically, and mindfully made, and wake up saying, “Merci, Sijo!”
products.specs:
•20 x 26

•Care instructions: To keep your French Linen Pillowcases luxuriously soft, use a gentle machine wash setting, tumble dry on low, or steam if preferred. Pillowcases can be dry cleaned as well

products.title: Smart Formula Botanical Skin & Coat Cleanser
products.description:
Smart Formula Botanical Skin & Coat Cleanser is easy to apply, even when faced with a wet and wiggly pet. It’s thin, lightweight formula can be quickly massaged into the coat, and the more of this innovative cleanser you use, the better the results. Traditional shampoos strip and remove oils critical to pet’s wellness, but Patika Pet’s micro-encapsulated technology and environmental shield displace dirt and replace it with proprietary blend of botanicals and nourishing ingredients. You get a complete clean and herbal therapy in one formula. No harsh, damaging detergents, just the best ingredients for healthy skin and a vibrant coat.

Low Suds. Quick Rinse. pH Balanced. Environmental Shield.

•A veterinary-formulated, proprietary blend of burdock, calendula, and orange oil that soothes inflammation, and helps hair and skin stay healthy.
•Microencapsulation technology allows dirt to be rinsed away while herbal extracts and peptides literally stick around to nourish the skin and hair.
products.specs:
•16.5oz/490ml
•Instructions: For best results and experience for your pet, apply generously, massage into the coat and skin, then rinse. Repeat if necessary.
•Cruelty free and contains no sulfates, parabens, dyes, or fragrances.
Ingredients: Water, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Arginine, Phenoxyethanol, Squalane, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Polyisobutene, Isohexadecane, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Propanediol, Limonene, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Silica, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Alumina, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Potassium Chloride, Potassium Phosphate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Stearic Acid, Sodium PCA, Polyglutamic Acid

Smart Formula Botanical Skin & Coat Waterless Cleanser is the perfect alternative to traditional washing. This innovative formula requires no additional water. Simply spray all over to wet the hair, then towel off vigorously. This will displace the dirt while Patika Pet’s micro-encapsulated technology and environmental shield remain and release a proprietary blend of botanicals and nourishing ingredients. 

Not only is this formula great for those pets less than enthusiastic about a shampoo, it’s terrific as a spot cleaner, a touch-up between full baths, or a quick clean for those times (like traveling) where you might not have time or facilities for a bath.

Spray On. No Rinse. pH Balanced. Environmental Shield.

•A veterinary-formulated, proprietary blend of burdock, calendula, and orange oil that soothes inflammation, and helps hair and skin stay healthy.
•Micro-encapsulation technology allows dirt to be wiped away while herbal extracts and peptides literally stick around to nourish the skin and hair.
•This exclusive and innovative Waterless Cleanser is cruelty free and contains no sulfates, parabens, dyes, or fragrances.

Deep Clean: Spray on evenly, brush into coat or massage into skin, then quickly and vigorously towel off.

products.title: Pillow Blend Silicone Blending Applicator
products.description: The Pillow Blend is the hottest innovation in makeup application. The silicone applicator lasts longer than a sponge – which need be replaced every two months – and absorbs less makeup than a brush. (Even synthetic brushes that are less porous than natural brushes can trap pigment at the base.) With Pillow Blend, you can use less makeup to get the same flawless coverage you would achieve with a blending sponge or professional brushes. By using the silicone blending applicator to apply the liquid or cream products, the amount needed for application is reduced by nearly half. It’s also more hygeniec than using your hands which can deposit unwanted dirt, oil and bacteria on the skin. The oil-resistant Pillow Blend is latex free and reusable which helps minimize waste for working makeup artists and helps minimize cost over time for makeup lovers.

Wyld’s tough love konjac body sponge is soft and luxuriating, with just the right amount of grit for your rougher spots. Handmade with the konjac plant, and dusted with ultra fine ground loofah on one side, this sponge gets ultra foamy paired with your favourite body wash, to deep cleanse and exfoliate your skin.

Add this to your daily bathing routine to buff away dead skin, unclog pores and stimulate skin renewal for silky-smooth skin.
products.specs:
• All-Natural, 100% plant-based, cruelty-free, vegan, biodegradable
• Ingredients: Konjac root fibre, loofah
• pH balanced
• All skin types, including blemish-prone skin and dry skin

products.title: SIREN SILK Multi-Tasking Hydration Creme
products.description:
Inspired by the captivating beauty of mythical Sirens, Siren Silk is a purely natural whipped creme that *actually* performs — singing sweetly of hydrating, resurfacing and rejuvenating while she feeds skin with a rich medley of Sea Retinol, Superherbs, superfood antioxidants, and plumping omegas. She's your BFF when you need deep moisture and lives to make your skin look and feel like pure silk — soft, smooth, and subtly dewy.

Formulated to be an intensely moisturizing and ultra-perfecting cream concentrate that offers immediate improvement in the filling of fine lines & wrinkles. Siren Silk is the ultimate night treatment for all skin types. For daytime use, she is perfect for dry/mature/sensitive skin.

products.title: Hewa Pendant (SIlver)
products.description: Bringing the work of Kenyan artisans to jewelry lovers around the world. SOKO creates elegant and modern pieces using high quality metals and a unique, ethical manufacturing process. Through their proprietary “virtual factory,” artisans can process and receive orders, directly connecting them to the SOKO design team. This process allows artisan to make on average 5x more than they would in their local markets, empowering them to preserve and improve heritage techniques.

products.title: Pure Eir Sanitizing Spray
products.description: While 65.7% alcohol ensures an uber clean, calendula infused olive oil works to soften and soothe your skin with each application. Swirled with powerful essential oils for added antiviral and antimicrobial properties, Pure Eir provides an aromatic calm with each zesty, citrus-scented spritz.
products.specs:
• Instructions: Shake well. Spray on hands or surfaces and let air dry. Be careful to avoid eyes and other sensitive areas.

• Key Ingredients
• Ethyl Alcohol - 65.7% by volume. Artisanal 190 proof grain alcohol, locally sourced, with a lighter scent than its cousin Isopropyl alcohol.
• *Calendula Infused Olive Oil - Olive oil has been used for centuries to soften and soothe dry or irritated skin. Infused with calendula, known for its antimicrobial and antiviral properties.
• Cypress Oil - Studies have shown that Cypress oil has antiseptic and antimicrobial qualities. Also known to fight bacteria on the skin.
• Sweet Orange Oil - With its antibacterial and antioxidant qualities, the scent of sweet orange aids in calming anxiety and uplifting the mind and spirit.
• Eucalyptus - This essential oil has antimicrobial properties; some studies show it may even be effective as a natural antibiotic.
• *Witch Hazel - Various studies have concluded that the tannins in witch hazel have a high efficacy in fighting germs, including the common flu.

• Ingredients: Ethyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract*, Aqua (Water, Eau) , Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Cupressus Sempervirens (Cypress) Oil, Aniba osaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Canarium Luzonicum (Elemi) Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil

• Size: 2 oz

• Other Info: Vegan. All Skin Types.

• *Organic ingredients. Store in a cool environment.

• For external use only. Information is provided for educational use; please consult your doctor before using if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or are breastfeeding. If you have skin sensitivities, speak to your doctor and/or try the product first in a small area of your skin. This information has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This information is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. No medical claims are being made.

• Fragrance-free and gentle on your skin without stripping your skin of excess oils.
• Cruelty-free and vegan. Paraben-free.

Rinse face with warm water or use a damp washcloth. For best results, follow up with the double cleansing method of washing face with a clarifying cleanser.

products.title: Surf Mud Sun Protection Balm
products.description: Inspired by the Mayan chocolate mask, this water-resistant and 100% reef safe formula calls on seven key ingredients, including Non-Nano Zinc for UV sun protection, to deliver a hydrating, cocoa-scented sun shield. A favorite amongst the Eir community, this is a go-to choice for beach bums, outdoor junkies, or your everyday go-getter.
products.specs:
• Instructions: Apply dime-sized amount to face and blend. Great by itself or under makeup as a primer. For everyday use, and for all skin types.

• Size: 2 oz
• Other Info: All Skin Types

• Key Ingredients
• Non-Nano Zinc Oxide - An all-natural, non-chemical protection against UVA and UVB light rays.
• Beeswax - Creates a barrier that helps to seal moisture into the skin making the product water repellent.
• Cocoa Butter - It is high in fatty acids to help penetrate the skin for deep hydration. Improves skin tone & elasticity, keeping skin young & healthy.
• *Cocoa Powder - Packed with antioxidants that help repair skin cells and neutralize harmful free radicals. Loaded with antioxidants, cocoa protects the skin from harmful UV rays and acts as a natural sunscreen. Promotes blood flow and increases cellular healing to develop a sunkissed glow.
• Vitamin E Oil - Boosting collagen production, a connective tissue that keeps skin elastic. Used as a natural preservative.

• Active Ingredients: Non-Nano Zinc Oxide

• Inactive Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Beeswax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder*, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate

• *Organic ingredients. Store in a cool environment.

products.title: Confidant Lipstick
products.description:
The perfect warm-toned beige, Confidant gives your lips just the right amount of a flattering hue to finish off the look. Confidant is ultra flattering across skin tones (and quickly became Rella Beauty's bestseller!).

•The satin-matte finish means this lipstick will glide on without dragging or drying while still giving you long lasting wear. It stays put and keeps your lips feeling hydrated all at the same time.

•Thoughtfully designed with a triangular pointed tip, this perfectly fits your cupid’s bow making it super easy to apply.

products.title: 32 oz Sierra (Salt Marsh)
products.description:
These highly rated summer water bottles are ready for any adventure. With design in mind, these stylish wide mouth bottles know how to keep you cool (pun intended). Using innovative MiraGuard Technology, Mira bottles enhance the daily hydration experience by keeping drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Whether you’re at the beach or on the slopes, your Mira bottle is the best beverage companion.

The Mira Advantage
•MiraGuard Technology: Drinks stay cold or hot for hours due to their innovative double-wall vacuum insulation. For added insulation, cups include a copper coating that provides a temperature shield.
•Sweat-Free Exterior: Don’t sweat it, with a condensation-free exterior prevents your cup from sweating in your hands.
•BPA-Free: Stay healthy with Mira's BPA-free, phthalates-free & non-toxic cup.
•18/8 Stainless Steel: Constructed from food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, Mira's high-quality cups won’t rust, retain or transfer flavors.
•Durable Coating: Hold your cup with comfort & ease as all of Mira cups have a protective outside coating.

Mira is all about adventure, style, and sustainability. They are a California based company that creates BPA-free, reusable and vacuum insulated stainless steel product lines that offer a greener alternative to plastic products.
products.specs:
•32 oz / 960 ml
•9.9 x 4 x 4 inches
•Cleaning Instructions: Hand washing your sports water bottle is recommended with a bottle brush. The bottle is NOT dishwasher safe. The lid is top rack only, but hand washing is also preferred. Please do NOT store sugary drinks in the water bottle for more than 24 hours.
•BPA Free

products.title: Minty Conditions Foot Soak
products.description: This deeply relaxing peppermint salt blend gives much-needed relief to achy feet, blisters, and tired legs. A perfect aid after a challenging day, use these salts to help you back onto your feet.
products.specs:
• Instructions: Scoop three tablespoons into a basin or bath with warm water and soak tired feet for 10 mins or longer.

• Key Ingredients
• Epsom Salt - One of our favorite ingredients. We swear by this after long strenuous workouts or training. It helps relieve muscle tension, pain, and inflammation in joints, and also helps alleviate soreness.
• Lavender Essential Oil - Boasting powerful antioxidants, it is commonly used to speed up the healing process of sore muscles due to its anti-inflammatory properties.
Peppermint - Provides a cooling sensation and has a calming effect on the body which can aid in the relief of sore muscles.
• Tea Tree Essential Oil - Helps to rejuvenate the skin. Also, known for its antibacterial, antimicrobial, antiseptic properties, it helps soothe the affected areas.

• Ingredients: Magnesium Sulfate (Epsom Salt), Gray Sea Salt, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Tocopherol Acetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Arnica Montana Flower Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*

• Size: 8 oz

products.title: Medium Wet/Dry Bag (Multi)
products.description:
Did you know that the idea for Quagga Green was sparked while its founder was on an African safari? 🦒 Barry Horn created Quagga Green in an effort to do more for the majestic creatures he came upon, who were being threatened by poachers and habitat decline. Each of their products are ethically made using only recycled or sustainable materials, and give back to protect our wildlife and the land they call home through Big Life Africa.

The Wet Swim Pouch is just the same — made from a recycled polyester fabric, woven from yarn created by breaking down plastic bottles into plastic chips that are converted into a strong fiber. We love what this brand is doing to transform single-use products into something beautiful and functional, fighting for ethical practices and the protection of our natural spaces!
products.specs: • Oversized construction: 12.5" x 10.5"

products.title: Post Session Salts
products.description: A rejuvenating compound for the overworked body, these arnica-infused salts are deeply soothing for aching, tender muscles. Ingredients like bergamot and ginger help to soothe the mind, while Epsom Salts work to draw out toxins, leaving you relaxed all over. Use these for a well-deserved soak after a strenuous day of activity.

• Ginger Essential Oil - Has a warming effect on the body, relaxing the body by relieving stress by promoting the production of serotonin and reducing the effects of adrenaline.
• Rosemary Essential Oil - Helps with circulation which flushes out toxins.

products.title: Relax Skin Kit
products.description:
Looking for some R&R this summer? Look no further and treat your skin with this relaxing trio!

Refresh Eucalyptus Toning Mist: If you experience breakouts, congested skin and redness, we could be a perfect match. My secret formula? Eucalyptus water and alcohol-free witch hazel are natural anti-inflammatories containing gallic acid and tannins which visibly reduce active blemishes.

Soothe Pink Clay Mask: Just because you have sensitive skin, doesn’t mean that you can’t #selfcaresunday with a pore-targeting face mask. I get down and dirty while keeping your skin flare-up free. My French pink clay is the mildest of clays and I’m also packed with rosehip extract – high in active Vitamin C and carotenoids which gently fight against age spots and wrinkles.
•for normal / dry skin
•minimizes pores

Piña Colada Sugar Lip Polish: What’s better than Piña Coladas on the beach? Piña Coladas all year round, duh. I’m a yummy, tropical treat made for exfoliating and moisturizing your lips. Different than the other lip scrubs on the block – I contain zero artificial colors or flavors and am guaranteed to never dry out. Just totally natural scrubby sugar and hydrating oils for the softest lips ever.
products.specs:
•Refresh Eucalyptus Toning Mist
-2 oz. / 60 mL glass bottle with fine spray top.
-Application Directions: Shake well, close eyes and mist over entire face. Let the floral waters, aloe, and witch hazel sink into your skin. Discover your happy place.
-Keep away from children and direct sunlight.

•Soothe Pink Clay Mask:
-2.3 oz. / 20 g. glass jar
-Application Directions:Mix 1 tbsp. of clay mask with a few drops of your preferred liquid element, such as water or a toner, in a dish until a paste is formed. Massage onto skin or apply with mask brush, avoiding the eye area. Let dry for 8-12 minutes. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat skin dry.
-Ingredient list:
Kaolin (White Kaolin Clay), Illite/Kaolin (French Pink Clay), Rosa Canina (Rosehip Extract), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium Oil)

White Kaolin Clay: Ideal for balancing oil production and unclogging congested pores, this wonder-worker clay is a staple in all NIU BODY masks.

French Pink Clay: One of the mildest of all clays, French Pink clay is ideal for normal to sensitive skin types. Less drying than other types of clays, it will help to balance tone and decrease the appearance of pore by gently drawing out oil.

Rosehip Extract: Naturally high in Vitamin C, bioflavonoids and 32 other vitamins, rosehip extract soothes the skin and maintains skin suppleness.

•Piña Colada Sugar Lip Polish
-0.5 oz. / 15 g. glass jar
-Application Directions: Apply pea-size amount of scrub to lips with finger. Exfoliate by massaging sugar crystals against skin. Wash (or lick!) off excess for a super sweet treat.
-Ingredients: Sucrose (Sugar), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Fractionated Coconut Oil), Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Coconut Oil), Ozokerite, Microcrystalline Wax, Polybutene (Not Petroleum Derived), Silica, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Persea Gratissima Oil (Avocado Oil), Flavour (Natural Flavouring), Simmondsia Chinensis Oil (Jojoba Oil), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)

-Parabens
-Sulfates

-Artificial preservatives
-Animal testing/by-products

products.title: Medium Wet/Dry Bag (Bumble Bee)
products.description:
Did you know that the idea for Quagga Green was sparked while its founder was on an African safari? 🦒 Barry Horn created Quagga Green in an effort to do more for the majestic creatures he came upon, who were being threatened by poachers and habitat decline. Each of their products are ethically made using only recycled or sustainable materials, and give back to protect our wildlife and the land they call home through Big Life Africa.

The Wet Swim Pouch included in our 2019 Summer Box is just the same — made from a recycled polyester fabric, woven from yarn created by breaking down plastic bottles into plastic chips that are converted into a strong fiber. We love what this brand is doing to transform single-use products into something beautiful and functional, fighting for ethical practices and the protection of our natural spaces!

Then, for every product sold, they remove one pound of trash from our ocean and waterways. To date, they’ve removed over 3 million pounds.

products.title: Nourish Bar
products.description:
The Nourish Bar Soap provides long-lasting moisture and conditioning. Formulated with coconut, rose hip (hello, antioxidants!) + jojoba oils and bentonite clay to detoxify, enrich and nourish the skin. The seaweed prebiotics plump the skin, smoothing out fine lines to create youthful-looking skin. Suitable for all skin types. 
 

Jojoba Oil is antioxidant-rich and high in Vitamin E and B-complex. This ingredient regenerates and hydrates the skin. Acts as a barrier to external irritants.

Rose Hips are nutrient-rich with moisturizing and soothing properties. Gently firms uneven skin and fades scars from acne, eczema or psoriasis. Reduces fine lines, wrinkles and dark under eye circles.

Avocado Oil is suitable for all skin types. It feels luxurious because it easily absorbs into the skin. The high contents of vitamin A, D and E will calm sensitive skin and rejuvenate damaged skin. 

Bentonite Clay contains rich minerals that not only soothe and protect the skin but also rid the body of heavy metals, pathogens, chemicals, radiation exposure and toxins. When applied topically, the clay functions as a magnet, attaching to positively-charged particles (toxins), and removing them from the body. 

Excellent for dry, parched or problematic skin.
